mapper.sql: id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, type, code, status, resource_id
mapper.select: select up.id, up.type, up.code from upms_permission up inner join upms_permission_role_rel uprr on up.id = uprr.permission_id

select up.id id, up.code, route_id, name, upe.type from upms_permission up inner join upms_page_element upe on upe.id = up.resource_id where up.is_deleted = 0 and upe.is_deleted = 0 and up.type = 'PAGE_ELEMENT' and upe.route_id = #{routeId} and up.is_deleted = 0 and upe.is_deleted = 0
select up.id, code from upms_permission up inner join upms_permission_role_rel uprr on uprr.permission_id = up.id where role_id = #{roleId} and up.type = #{type} and up.is_deleted = 0
